metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8035 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: This vulnerability relates to the user's browser processing of DUCC webpage input data.The javascript comprising Apache UIMA DUCC (<= 2.2.2) which runs in the user's browser does not sufficiently filter user supplied inputs, which may result in unintended execution of user supplied javascript code.

criterions.comment: uimaj package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
